c: Hi, I'm Chatbot. I'm trying to give better movie recommendations than Netflix can. We will start with some questions to figure out your interests. Then I will give you a movie available on Netflix to watch!

Hi, I'm Chatbot. I'm trying to give better movie recommendations than Netflix can. We will start with some questions to figure out your interests. Then I will give you a movie available on Netflix to watch!
What genre of movies do you want?
Who would you like to see starring in a movie?
Can you tell me which director you like?
What should the MPAA rating for this movie be? (eg. PG-13, R, G)
I'm thinking about what you might like.
How about Commando (1985)?

Commando stars Matthew Weisman, Rae Dawn Chong, Mark L. Lester, James Horner, Vernon Wells, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Steven E. de Souza, Joel Silver, Dan Hedaya, Jeph Loeb and is directed by Jeph Loeb, Matthew Weisman, Steven E. de Souza.
This film is 90 minutes long. It is an action, adventure and thriller movie, and is rated R.
Have you watched this movie before?
Do you like this recommendation?
Bye! Please click the next button to proceed.
